Articles.Content:
I don't know whether I am the first to do this but it was kind of lengthy even with this atmospheric flight craft design.

I saw this design on the forums somewhere, I don't know whether it is a bug or not. You may call it cheating... I call it efficiency but without further ado I present, Around Kerbin whilst remaining within the lower atmosphere.

Feel free to correct me if I am not the first to do this without mods/hacked parts.

(also sorry if this is an issue in any way, I know how annoyed people get on these forums sometimes)

EDIT: not the first time it has been done

It was a pretty trip anyway

Edited August 31, 2012 by zpox357

I saw this design on the forums somewhere, I don't know whether it is a bug or not.

Something that can circumnavigate a world using no fuel? The magic turbine is definitely a bug. Circumnavigation has been done conventionally, e.g. here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17301-Pan-Kerbal-Super-Sonic-Transportation-Challenge
Oh wow, I had no idea that this was possible using powered flight like that, ahh well, it was a pretty and beautiful trip
This would be impressive if it weren't a bug.
